The AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Professional (SAP-C02) certification is a highly sought-after credential for IT professionals looking to showcase their expertise in architecting and deploying complex applications on the Amazon Web Services (AWS) platform. This certification is designed for individuals who have already obtained the AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate certification and are ready to take their skills to the next level.

The SAP-C02 exam is designed to validate an individual's advanced technical skills and experience in building and deploying scalable, secure, and robust applications on AWS. It covers a wide range of topics, including advanced architectural design, deployment management, data security, networking, and cost optimization.

To earn the SAP-C02 certification, candidates must pass a rigorous exam that consists of multiple-choice and multiple-response questions, as well as hands-on exercises. The exam is designed to assess the candidate's ability to design, build, and deploy complex solutions on the AWS platform, taking into consideration factors such as scalability, availability, security, and cost optimization.

By obtaining the AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Professional certification, individuals can demonstrate their proficiency in designing and implementing highly available and fault-tolerant applications on AWS. This credential is highly regarded in the industry and is recognized by employers as a validation of an individual's advanced skills and knowledge in architecting solutions on the AWS platform.

The benefits of achieving the SAP-C02 certification are numerous. Firstly, it opens up a wide range of career opportunities for certified professionals. With the increasing adoption of cloud technologies, the demand for skilled AWS Solutions Architects is on the rise. By obtaining this certification, individuals can position themselves as experts in cloud architecture and gain a competitive edge in the job market.

Secondly, the SAP-C02 certification provides individuals with a deep understanding of the AWS platform and its services. This knowledge can be applied to design and deploy highly scalable and fault-tolerant applications, ensuring the efficient and cost-effective operation of cloud-based solutions.

Lastly, the SAP-C02 certification is a testament to an individual's commitment to professional growth and continuous learning. AWS regularly updates its services and introduces new features, and certified professionals are required to stay up-to-date with the latest developments. By maintaining their certification, individuals can ensure that their skills remain relevant and in-demand.

In conclusion, the AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Professional (SAP-C02) certification is a valuable credential for IT professionals looking to showcase their expertise in architecting and deploying complex applications on the AWS platform. By obtaining this certification, individuals can open up new career opportunities, gain a deep understanding of the AWS platform, and demonstrate their commitment to professional growth.

courseDetails.title: Human Resource Development the complete course
courseDetails.shortDescription: Strengthen your leadership skills by expanding your academic background knowledge with a lot of practical content
courseDetails.longDescription:
Would you like to improve your skills in personnel management and are you a manager or a person with responsibility? This course offers you the necessary background knowledge with many practical examples to get you started quickly. The target group are (future) managers, project managers, people in leading positions or simply all people with responsibility on the job.

I have implement both scientific content and my own experience as a trainer, coach and manager into these lessons. This will give you a good overview of the most important instruments of personnel development, which will expand and strengthen your professionalism as a personnel developer or/and manager.

In this course we will deal with the following contents:

  1. Introduction to personnel development: In addition to defining personnel development, it is also important to get a good overview of this discipline. Furthermore, a demarcation to organisational development and coaching is made and the possible target groups are defined.

  2. Management theories: In order to better link necessary correlations and developments, this chapter provides you with a brief review of the history. Immediately afterwards we will take a look at the newer forms of organization such as Scrum and Holocracy. We also discuss the suitability of agile methods as well as the self-organization of companies, hierarchies and roles.

  3. Leadership concepts: In human resources development as a manager or human resources specialist, you are also an expert in leadership concepts. You will learn the most fundamental approaches so that you can apply them in management coaching. In addition to the professional teaching, it is also about a basic understanding of how leadership works and how you can implement these concepts in your own organization.

  4. Management Diagnostics: In this section you will learn about various approaches to measuring requirements and profiles. For this purpose we will go through requirements for managers and management diagnostics. In addition to the differentiation of leadership and management, the focus is on the preparation of the measurements. Furthermore, we will discuss the concept of appraisal interviews and how self-assessment of managers can be used for personnel development. We close this chapter with a self-reflection with the Johari Window.

  5. Management coaching: As a manager and/or personnel developer you will often accompany employees and/or managers on their way. In addition, you will learn the basic building blocks of process consulting. We will also discuss the consulting parts of coaching and focus on typical management tasks. With the necessary background knowledge and getting to know the 10 management roles, you will also be able to better allocate the various occasions for coaching. This is followed by the clarification of the assignment, which is obligatory in both small and large contexts. The triangular contract is often encountered in management coaching, which is why we will discuss its particularities. In the further course we will deal with the distinction between external and internal coaches as well as managers as coaches. At the end of the lesson we will discuss possible traps in management coaching.

  6. Systemic Coaching - An express introduction: This chapter is intended to give you a rough overview of systemic coaching. Since this topic is so comprehensive, I have provided a short excerpt from my separate course "Systemic Coaching - the complete course". If you would like to deepen your knowledge here, I invite you to take a look at the advanced course.

  7. Recruiting: Recruiting is an umbrella term that includes both recruitment and selection. Depending on your previous experience, you can deal with biographical, property-oriented procedures in this chapter. We also discuss assessment centers and how they can implement this concept in smaller companies. In addition to many examples, we also deal with hearings. This is followed by onboarding and outplacement, which is essential for successful employer branding.

  8. Key figures in personnel development: Key figures in personnel development: As (future) decision-makers, you need data-based bases for decision-making. To do this, they should have a basic understanding of the most common key figures in the HR sector. In this short lesson, you will learn a few practical examples.

  9. Employee surveys: Sooner or later you will be confronted with surveys in your work as a manager. No matter whether you only accompany them because you buy an external consulting service, or conduct the survey yourself, in this chapter we will go into the objectives, planning and implementation in more detail.

  10. Employer branding: Employer branding has long since ceased to be a fad. Nearly every HR department has already implemented EB- projects or wants to take even more initiatives in the future. In this lesson, you will learn how to define and differentiate between brand and branding, and you will also receive initial implementation recommendations. The larger the company, the more you will be involved in talent management, which we also cover.

With this online course you will receive strategic guidance for personnel development which you can implement for your own company.

Secure your knowledge advantage and enroll in this course right now.

I look forward to seeing you in the course.

Many greetings

Markus Edenhauser, MA MSc
targetAudiences: People with responsibility in their job who want to develop their personal leadership and coaching skills. People who also reflect critically on their actions and strive for improvement.

courseDetails.title: Systemic Coaching the complete course
courseDetails.shortDescription: Start your coaching career now. You get theory, practical knowledge, methods and tools for your first coaching sessions
courseDetails.longDescription:
Systemic coaching - the complete course!

Start your coaching career now. You get theory, practical knowledge, methods and tools for your first coaching sessions.

Would you like to develop your coaching skills and are you a manager or a person with responsibility? This course offers you the necessary background knowledge with many practical examples to get a quick start in coaching.

I have prepared both scientific content and my own experience from ~4000 training and coaching hours into these lessons. This will give you a good overview of systemic coaching, which will expand and consolidate your professionalism in coaching.

In this course we will deal with the following contents:

  1. What is systemic coaching: What forms of consulting are there, what are typical coaching occasions and which target group do we have in the systemic environment. We also deal with the definition of the term coaching and the limits of organisational and personnel development. At the end of the lesson we will discuss possible coaching traps.

  2. Systems theory: For an all-encompassing understanding, a little theory is needed on the origins of the systemic approach. For this purpose we take a closer look at constructivism, cybernetics and autopoiesis. Furthermore, this chapter deals with the systemic approach and why one should not give advice in coaching. We end the lesson with the important differentiation of the advisory and home system.

  3. Me as a coach: In these lessons we will ask ourselves the question: What competencies do you need as a coach? There will also be an excursion into feedback and conflict culture.

  4. Contract and Order: From the first meeting to the first contact to the contract, this chapter covers everything to clarify the order. This chapter is relevant for and with the coachee because of the definition of objectives. In addition, methods for clarifying objectives are also presented.

  5. Systemic conversation: We now go deeper into the subject matter and devote ourselves to the course of a coaching session, the arrival at the coaching as well as communication and the importance of empathy.

  6. The Systemic Loop: For a basic understanding of the coaching process, the Systemic Loop is a tool that will help you to work through the case in each coaching session. For this we will focus on basics like perception and interpretation as well as active listening. We will also deal with hypotheses and examine what exactly a problem is.

  7. Questioning techniques: After the introduction there are some lessons of the questioning techniques that are most important to me. In each lesson there are also examples of application.

  8. Interventions: There can never be enough interventions. In about 20 lessons, I will introduce you to my most productive and best interventions to date. After these lessons you will have collected enough methods for your own coaching sessions.

  9. Conflicts: I find the topic of conflicts particularly important for coaching. In addition to the definition, we deal with the meaning, causes and types. We end the chapter with the escalation stages and possible clarification scenarios for conflict situations.

Get your knowledge advantage right now and enroll in this course.

I look forward to seeing you in the class.

Many greetings
Markus Edenhauser, MA MSc
targetAudiences: People who want to coach people and accompany them in change processes

courseDetails.title: Interior Design with Generative AI
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn how to design interiors using generative AI, remodel your bedroom, bathroom, kitchen, living room, and home office
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to Interior Design with Generative AI course. This is a comprehensive project based course where you will be guided step by step on how to generate stunning interior designs using the cutting edge AI technologies. This course will give you a whole new perspective about the future of interior design and you will be amazed by how far artificial intelligence has advanced in the past couple of years to the point where you can generate aesthetic interior designs with only a single click. This technology will definitely save a lot of your time and energy. Can you imagine, rearranging your room using AI or generating captivating interior designs and detailed floor plans in less than a minute? Well those are things that you are going to learn in this course and even more exciting, you will also learn how to potentially turn this opportunity into an interior design agency business. In the introduction session, you will learn the basic fundamentals of generative AI and interior design, such as getting to know generative AI applications in interior design, its limitations, and you will get to see the showcase of interior designs generated by AI. Then, in the next session, we will start the projects, so the project will be consisted of four main sections, in the first section, you will learn how to generate high quality interior designs using AI tools like Spacely AI, Interior Render AI, Architect Render, Reimagine Home AI, AI Home Design, Visualize AI, Prome AI, and Oda Studio AI. Afterward, in the second section, you will learn how to rearrange and customise your room using AI tools like Reroom AI, AITWO, RoomGPT IO, the process is very straightforward, all you need to do is to upload the image of the room that you want to design, then AI will automatically reorganise the room and make it more beautiful and more aesthetic. Meanwhile, in the third section, you will learn how to generate floor plans using an AI tool called Maket IO. Lastly, in the fourth section, you will learn how to utilize virtual reality technologies like Copernic AI and Skybox Blockade Labs to visualize interior design. Once you have learnt to use generative AI for interior design, then, you will get to know several business models to monetise your interior design skills, such as building interior design agencies, doing home staging for real estate sales, and partnering with rental companies. Last but not least, to take it to the next step, you will also learn how to build a website for your interior design agency using an AI tool called Pineapple Builder. By having a professional website that showcases your interior designs gallery, it will be easier for you to get your first clients.

Firstly, before getting into the course, we need to ask this question to ourselves: why should we utilize generative AI for interior design? Well there are many reasons why and let me answer it from the perspective of interior designers and architects, generating fresh ideas and design concepts can be very time consuming as it will require you to concentrate while exploring your imagination. In addition to that, turning designs in your imagination into reality can also be quite challenging as you will need to draw the sketch while paying very close attention to every single detail. Therefore, generative AI can be all in one solution to those problems as it enables you to not only generate creative innovations for your designs but also automatically transform it into high quality images. Lastly, the interior design industry will always be in high demand in the market because houses are basic human necessities and definitely people want to design their living space to be comfortable and functional.

Below are things that you can expect to learn from this course:

  • Learn the basic fundamentals of generative AI and interior design

  • Learn how to design interiors and modify objects using Spacely AI

  • Learn how to design kitchen and living room interior with Interior Render AI

  • Learn how to turn sketch into rendering using Generative AI

  • Learn how to remodel bathroom interior using ReImagineHome AI

  • Learn how to remodel bedroom interior using AI Home Design

  • Learn how to remodel stairs using Visualize AI

  • Learn how to design bedroom interior using Prome AI

  • Learn how to design home office interior using Oda Studio AI

  • Learn how to design dining room interior and add natural lighting using ReRoom AI

  • Learn how to remodel laundry room using AITWO

  • Learn how to design backyard interior using RoomGPT IO

  • Learn how to generate residential floor plan using Maket AI

  • Learn how to generate 3D interior designs using Copernic AI

  • Learn how to generate 3D interior designs using Skybox AI

  • Learn how to monetise your interior design skills and get to know several business models like building interior design agency, home staging for real estate sales, and selling customisable interior design packages

  • Learn how to build website for your interior design agency business using Pineapple Builder
